q: He doesn't even acknowledge this fact. Donald Rumsfeld 's distortions of the issue don't stop there. At one point, he denies that he did limit the number of troops on the ground. With nearly a half million ground troops available if necessary, he writes, "this was not the "light footprint" war plan some critics would later claim it was"( p. 438). This is incredibly dishonest.
